topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54724a3d6368723d67450100#post_54724a3d6368723d67450100
Fukken goody for you, want a damn cookie or something?

Honestly its not even the offence that bothers me. People do indeed have the right to be offended. Hell we've all got different opinions, preferences and views on life to the point that its all but impossible to create something truly free of controversy, and you know what? If something does step on people's tits I have no problem with them giving a hearty "fuck you!" to the offender and making their grievances known.

What makes it all so fucking infuriating for me is this attitude of "if it offends me then it is literally worse than the Holocaust, female circumcision and global climate change combined! And if someone dares to like this thing that offends me they're a double Hitler!"
